attributes.action: Share our COVID-19 vaccine stockpile to vaccinate the vulnerable globally.
attributes.background: Assume that those who are not vulnerable and do not respond to COVID-19 vaccination notifications from the NHS wish for their vaccines to be used to vaccinate those deemed vulnerable in countries where COVID-19 vaccination is not widely available.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802

Donate surplus Covid-19 vaccine doses to poorer countries: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565462
